subject: My Dear,
body:
My Dear,
Hello
I have registered your ATM VISA CARD of ($3.8Million Universal Courier Express with registration code Number (UN775605594BN ).
please contact the international registered delivery Company with your information such as:-
1. Name In Full :
2. Address :
3. Occupation ;
4. Nationality :
5. Direct Phone :
The Contact Person name ARE: MR. Ben William Mark   E-mail: (
williamsmmrben@gmail.com
)
Note: I have paid for the Insurance & activation charges.
The only fee you have to pay is the compulsory delivery fee only. Please indicate the registration Number and ask him to provide you the information to send the delivery fee.
Best Regards,
Ms  Nancy Phillips

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Hello Ms Nancy Phillips,

Thank you so much for your message. I'm really excited about this ATM VISA CARD! Could you please tell me more about it? What is the Universal Courier Express and how does it work? 

Also, could you clarify what the delivery fee is for? Is it for the courier service to deliver the card to my address?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Thanks for contacting my office concerning the ATM visa card loaded with
funds in your account.
Do you have any WhatsApp number?
The fee is to pay for delivery company to deliver the ATM visa card to your
address. The fee is 550 dollar.
Send your details include your WhatsApp number.
I shall be waiting for your message soon.
Best Regards

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me about this ATM visa card. It sounds very interesting! Could you please tell me more about how this works? And, is there a specific delivery company that will be handling the card?

I'm sorry, but I can't provide my number at this time. Is there another way we can continue our conversation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Once you send the delivery company fee we shall registered the ATM card in
your name and send to your address in your country.
You will use the ATM card to withdraw your funds through any ATM card
machine all over in the world. And every day you can withdraw maximum
amount of 20,000 dollar.

So why you don't want to send your number what will I use your WhatsApp
number for.

If you are ready to received your atm send the delivery fee .
Thanks

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message. It sounds like a very convenient way to access funds! I'm curious, how does the ATM card work? Can it be used in any ATM machine worldwide without any additional charges?

Also, could you please explain more about the delivery fee? How much is it and what does it cover exactly?

I appreciate your help with this. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
The ATM card is valid and can withdraw money from any ATM machine in the
world and there is no additional fee else where.
The delivery charge is 550 USD only and its meant for your ATM card
delivery shipping to your country precisely your address.
As soon you send the fee I will start the processing of your atm card
registration for delivery.
Best Regards

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message. It's really interesting to know that the ATM card can be used worldwide without any additional fees. That sounds very convenient!

I'm curious about the delivery charge though. Could you please provide more details? How is this fee calculated and why is it necessary? 

Also, could you explain a bit more about the process of getting this ATM card? I'd like to understand better how it works.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Just like that you send the fee the processing will be completed without
delay

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm quite interested in what you're saying, but could you please explain a bit more about this fee? What exactly is it for and how does it help in completing the processing?

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Exactly my meaning the delivery fee is to completing your ATM card delivery
at your house within 3 days it will arrived. And you will start to withdraw
money daily by daily through any ATM machine worldwide.

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that sounds really interesting! I've never heard of something like this before. So, you're saying that I can withdraw money daily from any ATM machine worldwide? That's quite fascinating. 

Could you please explain a bit more about how this works? Like, how does the ATM card get loaded with money? And is there a limit to how much I can withdraw each day?

Looking forward to hearing more about this amazing opportunity!

Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: My Dear,
body: Send your number we talk better understand?

subject: Re: My Dear,
body:
Oh, I'm really sorry but I can't assist with that.

Best wishes,
Doris
